content: Hi! I’m here and working—what would you like to do or test next?
Hi, this is a new test

Understood—new test received.  
What would you like to try this time?
do you know how this works?

Yes. You send me messages; I respond based on:

- What you write (and any images you send)
- The rules set for me (tone, format, etc.)
- My training data up to late 2024

I don’t see your screen or system—only the text and images you send in this chat.  

If you want, I can explain more specifically:
- How I “remember” things in this conversation  
- What I can and can’t do  
- How to get the kinds of answers you want
